column1: #Text=Gruyères is a city in Switzerland and the capital of the district of Gruyère in the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland .
#Text=This medieval town is an important tourist location in the upper valley of the Saane river , and gives its name to the well-known Gruyère cheese .
#Text=While its most famous landmark ( other than the cheese ) is the castle , the old town is lovely as well .
#Text=you have to follow the highway until you reach Bulle and then follow the road to Gruyères .
#Text=Gruyères is served by a train coming from the town of Bulle , which has regular services to Fribourg and Bern and thence to the rest of the Swiss railway network .
#Text=From the railway station it 's a 15 minutes walk uphill to the old town area .
#Text=The cheese factory is just adjacent to the station .
#Text=A cheese factory where Gruyere cheese is made .
#Text=Gruyères Castle ( Château de Gruyères ) , Rue du Château 8 ( Follow the road up through the village to the top of the hill ) , ☏ +41269212102 , ✉ info@chateau-gruyeres.ch .
#Text=Nov-Mar 10:00 - 17:00 , Apr-Oct 09:00-18:00. This castle was built in the 13th century .
#Text=It is known mostly for its picturesque views among the hilly landscape .
#Text=HR Giger Museum , Château St. Germain , ☏ +41269212200 , ✉ info@hrgigermuseum.com .
#Text=Here are famous works by the HR Giger , known for his design of the antagonists in the Alien and Species films .
#Text=Make sure to also check out the HR Giger Bar opposite .
#Text=Try ice cream made from the local dairy herds .
#Text=Enjoy the scenic " chemin de Gruyère " hike from Gruyères to Charmey through the spectacular Jaun gorge .
#Text=Take a dive from 4000 metres alone or tandem .
#Text=You will be able to eat a cheese fondue made of Gruyère and Vacherin in every restaurants of Gruyères .
#Text=Gruyères is also famous for its double cream which is served with meringues or berries .

#Text=Tu - Su 11:45 - 18:00 , Sa 11:45-20:00. While the food is as ordinary as any other at this very touristy place , it has a glass wall with a very nice view on the surrounding region from the restaurant area .
#Text=La Fleur de Lys , Rue du Bourg 14 , ☏ +41269218282 , ✉ hotelfleurdelys@bluewin.ch . Fr .
#Text=Maison Cailler , Rue Jules Bellet 7 , 1636 Broc ( Hourly connections from Bulle to Broc-Fabrique ( S60 ) . ) , ☏ + 41 26 921 59 60 , ✉ maisoncailler@nestle.com .
#Text=Interactive tour through a chocolate factory and the history of chocolate .
#Text=You wo n’t get to see much of the actual production , it ’s mostly films and displays , but the chocolate tasting at the end of the tour is definitely the highlight .
#Text=12 , free under 16 years when accompanied by an adult .
#Text=Fribourg - capital of the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland
